0.text: This is a demonstration of my SDS

1.text: It's a system I worked on for my second raylib project.

2.text: Back then, I wasn't able to find a good implementation of a json-based dialogue system, so I decided to just do it myself.

3.text: I sure hope you know what SDS stands for?

6.text: Well, then go ahead, tell me!

8.text: No! It's the short form for Simple Dialogue System

12.text: It doesn't really have any special meaning, but does sound nice in my opinion!

15.text: No, I don't know to be honest.

16.text: No problem! It's the short form for Simple Dialogue System
